column4: is there a program that i can run so that i can use my computer at home from my computer at work?? but i cant run a program at work it has to be some sort of way i can log into my computer on internet explorer.. is there a way to do this runnign ubuntu 6.06 please??
deb if i telnet in that is text based, i want gui
will the VNC programs allow me to access my computer using only internet explorer on my remote computer????
VNC does not use internet explorer -- VNC is a program that runs on your computer waiting for connectiosn to be made to it -- once done, it serves the clients a picture of your desktop
